name: Astral Dodge
description:
Here's a quick little game I made! Just survive and gain points! Rise to the top of the leaderboard! Dodge asteroids and collect coins to unlock upgrades and new ships to help boost your score!

The leaderboard is run by GameJolt's API. You can put in a guest name if you don't have a GameJolt account.

If I think of things to add to this game, I'll update it!

Be sure to report any bugs you find!

Thank you!

---

How To Play:

  • Get close to red asteroids or touch green asteroids to gain points.
  • Touch yellow asteroids to get coins.
    Or every 100 points is 1 coin.
  • Move through the left and right walls to wrap around.
  • You can change your speed with the controls below.
  • Speed 1 for more precise movements.
    Speed 3 to zoom around.

---

Controls:

  • Press A or LEFT to go left.
  • Press D or RIGHT to go right.
  • Press W, S, UP, or DOWN to cycle your speed.
  • Press SPACE to shoot after you unlock A GUN.

---

Upgrades:

  • Multiplier
    • Double, triple, quadruple, or quintuple the amount of points and coins you get!
  • Extra Health
    • Add on to your total health!
  • Larger Range
    • Increase the minimum distance you have to be to a red asteroid to get bonus points.
  • More Coins
    • Make coin asteroids spawn more often.
  • A GUN
    • YOU GET A GUN! YOU WANT A GUN?!

---

Ships (Buy A GUN first):

Default Ship

There is nothing special about it.

---


Phase Gun

Your bullets can hit 3 asteroids before getting destroyed, but you get less points when destroying them.

---

Dual Gun

You can shoot two bullets at the same time.

---

Mini Ship

Your ship is smaller. You can fit in smaller spaces, but you move slower and you have to be closer to an asteroid for a bonus.

---

Dash Ship

Double tap left or right to dash in that direction.

---

Phase Ship

Press SHIFT to pass through all asteroids for a short amount of time.

---

All graphics (except for the main font), sounds, and programming done by Anne Webster.

She also did the title screen theme.
